title: Silliker Australia-Food and Beverage Testing Services, On-Site Auditing Services and Food Safety Consulting
text:
Print Email 
Silliker Australia is a leading analytical laboratory and technical consultancy that serves the food and beverage, antimicrobial and household products, medical devices, cosmetic, water and environmental industries. Silliker Australia was established in 1985 and joined the Silliker world network of laboratories based in Chicago, US, in 2000. 
Silliker has 45 laboratories in 16 countries that provide research, consulting, testing, auditing and training services to ensure product quality, safety and nutrition from development to delivery. Food and beverage testing services 
Silliker strives to raise the bar on food safety and quality. Our food and beverage testing services cover a wide variety of food products, including baked goods, beverages, cereals, confectionery, dairy products, eggs, seafood, fruit and vegetables, meat and poultry, and processed items. 
Silliker is experienced in all aspects of food quality assurance and can provide a comprehensive range of services, from routine laboratory analysis to the implementation and supervision of a full quality assurance programme. Microbiological and chemical analytical services 
Silliker offers a range of microbiological and chemical analytical services to companies in the food processing industry, to help ensure the quality and safety of food products. Silliker's microbiological and chemical laboratories are NATA accredited, TGA and APVMA licensed. 
Services include: Nutritional analysis and compliance to FSANZ, allergen testing, GMO analysis (PCR), pesticide residues, contaminants, antibiotics and pathogen testing Research, method development and validation Product recall management and troubleshooting Investigation of food poisoning and customer complaints Shelf life studies, product stability and challenge studies Technical consulting for the food industry 
All senior consultants at Silliker have a wealth of experience in undertaking on-site audits, plant inspections and production investigations. Silliker can perform audits of laboratory procedures and existing quality programmes, allergen management audits and supplier audits. 
We can also handle the planning and implementation of HACCP and food safety plans; the evaluation of sanitation, disinfection and hygiene programmes; and labelling compliance consultation. Auditing services for food processors 
Silliker provides auditing services that can be tailored to reflect your supplier specifications and expectations. Silliker audits are recognised by leading retailers, suppliers, manufacturers, distributors, restaurants and food service companies worldwide. 
Our highly trained auditors have years of experience in almost every food industry and segment of the food chain. A Silliker audit demonstrates a company's commitment to the highest standards of food safety and quality. As part of our audits, we provide an impartial and independent assessment of your safety programme. Food safety program (FSP) consulting 
Under government standard 3.2.1., Australian food companies must have a documented food safety program (FSP). The standard is based on the principle that food safety is best ensured through the identification and control of hazards in the production, manufacturing and handling of food as described in the Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Point (HACCP) system. 
Silliker offers a variety of expert food safety consulting services, including HACCP programme reviews, supplier audits, product recall procedure reviews, and quality systems evaluations, to support and improve your FSP. With years of experience working with leading food companies and industry regulators, including ANZFA, our highly trained and knowledgeable consultants can help you meet your food safety objectives.
